dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is composed of 60,000 colour images in 10 classes, with 6000 images in each class. It is widely used to evaluate image classifiers, especially for automatically designing CNN architectures.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 consists of the same number of images as CIFAR-10 but has 100 classes, making the classification task more difficult.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Y. Netzer
T. Wang
A. Coates
A. Bissacco
B. Wu
A. Y. Ng
dcterms:description: SVHN is a dataset that includes 73,257 images in the training set and 26,032 images in the test set, used for recognizing digits in natural images.
dcterms:title: SVHN (Street View House Numbers)
